content: अंगारकः --कं [अंगार स्वार्थे कन्] {@--1@} Charcoal. {@--2@} Mars; °विरुद्धस्य प्रक्षीणस्य बृहस्पतेः <ls>Mk. 9. 33</ls>; °चारः course of Mars, See chapter 6 of <ls>Bṛhat Saṃhitā</ls>. {@--3@} Tuesday (°-दिनं, °-वासरः). {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a prince of Sauvīra. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of two plants कुरंटक and भृंगराज, Eclipta (or Verbesina) Prostrata, and white or yellow Amaranth. --कं [अल्पार्थे कन्] {@--1@} A small spark. {@--2@} A medicated oil in which turmeric, Dūrvā, Manjishṭhā and other substances have been boiled.
